column2: or '''STP''' is a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]] based in [[wikipedia:Peru|Peru]]. It was founded on [[3 January|January 3]]
column4: on the 118th birthday of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. It has two [[The Tolkien Society#Smials|smials]]
column5: one for the North (Tumbes) and one for the South (Arequipa). The Society's main activities include the yearly ''Máratulda Vinyë Meldorinna''
column7: of which the fourth was held on [[4 April|April 4]]
